title: How do I Print or Share Investigation Requests and Results from MediRecords Patient Mobile App?
body:
In this article, we will guide you through the process of printing or sharing investigation requests and results using the MediRecords Patient Mobile App.
Open Patient Mobile App
Login as patient
Click Results icon
Click The PDF icon
Click the Share icon that can be found at top right corner.
You can now Print or Share the results to your own email address
